vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.32;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Asriel (H0844), Shechem (H7928) and Shemida (H8061);
father of: Zelophehad (H6765)
Also named: cheph.ri (חֶפְרִי "Hepherite" H2662)
§ Hepher = "a well"
n pr m
1) youngest son of Gilead and head of the family of Hepherites
2) son of Asher, the father of Tekoa
3) the Mecherathite, one of David's mighty warriors
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Maquir; tribu de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希弗 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "一口井"
陽性專有名詞
1) 基列最小的兒子且是希弗家族的族長 (民 26:32)
2) 亞施戶的兒子, 亞施戶是提哥亞之祖 (代上 4:5-6)
3) 米基拉人, 大衛的大能戰士之一 (代上 11:36)
專有名詞, 地名
4) 在古迦南地的一個地方, 約旦的西邊, 被約書亞所征服
地點不詳 #書 12:17|
4a) 猶太一地方, 可能和上述一樣 #王上 4:10|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希弗 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "一口井"
阳性专有名词
1) 基列最小的儿子且是希弗家族的族长 (民 26:32)
2) 亚施户的儿子, 亚施户是提哥亚之祖 (代上 4:5-6)
3) 米基拉人, 大卫的大能战士之一 (代上 11:36)
专有名词, 地名
4) 在古迦南地的一个地方, 约旦的西边, 被约书亚所征服
地点不详 #书 12:17|
4a) 犹太一地方, 可能和上述一样 #王上 4:10|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Hepher = "a well"
n pr loc
This name is used for:
1) a place in ancient Canaan, west of the Jordan, conquered by Joshua site unknown
2) a place in Judah, probably the same as 1 above
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (b)   lugar; territorio de Manasés; (c)   hijo de Ashur; tribu de Judá; (d)   guerrero; en tiempos de David

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.6;
son of: Ashhur (H0806) and Naarah (H5292B);
brother of: Ahuzzam (H0275), Temeni (H8488) and Haahashtari (H0326);
half-brother of: Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328), Ethnan (H0869) and Koz (H6976)
§ Hepher = "a well"
n pr loc
1) a place in ancient Canaan, west of the Jordan, conquered by Joshua site unknown
2) a place in Judah, probably the same as 1 above
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (b)   lugar; territorio de Manasés; (c)   hijo de Ashur; tribu de Judá; (d)   guerrero; en tiempos de David
